subject: Mental Health
title: Digital Mental Health Tools
description: Learn Digital Mental Health Tools in one minute.

hook.text: Therapy apps now reach millions of people who would never visit a clinic.

buildup.text: Digital CBT programs have shown real efficacy in randomized controlled trials.

discovery.text: AI chatbots provide 24/7 support for mild depression between therapy sessions.

twist.text: But unregulated apps risk giving bad advice to severely depressed users.

climax.text: The best tools blend technology with human oversight for safety.

punchline.text: Technology can extend the therapist's reach, not replace it.

quiz.question: What risk do unregulated mental health apps carry?
options: Giving bad advice to severely depressed users
